channel.title: Hammer on Matthew Zegar | Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content in Hammer on Matthew Zegar | Personal Website

item.title: Action Tag
item.description: I recently went about developing a new modification/game-mode for s&box called “Action Tag”. You can think of it as a mix between Action Quake and Freeze Tag. This project was a solo-effort. It forced me to learn a few new tools such as Hammer, Blender, Model-doc, etc. Hammer “2” s&box gives access to the latest set of Valve tools which includes access to Hammer. This version of Hammer is updated to support their latest engine “Source 2”.
